Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tradition[ENDCOLOR] is best for small empires.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Tradition greatly increases the rate of border expansion in cities and also grants 3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Unlocks building the Hanging Gardens.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Tradition tree will grant +10% [ICON_FOOD] Growth and a free Aqueduct in your first 4 cities. It also allows the purchase of Great Engineers with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.
